text:
Mechanisms of action of #hydroxychloroquine and #chloroquine: implications for #rheumatology

#Free to access!

The mechanisms discussed are not anti-viral, but are relevant to all immunomodulatory uses of these drugs 
#COVID19 #covid4rheum #covid4md
